intro: Elatostema austrosinense, commonly known as the southern Chinese snowflake plant, is a small herbaceous plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettles and related species. The plant is characterized by its rosette-forming leaves that are covered in fine hairs, giving it a fuzzy appearance. Its flowers are small, greenish-white, and clustered in dense inflorescences. Elatostema austrosinense is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and rocky areas.
